name: Hustle!
flavor: You and your allies coordinate to form a new battle line.
target: Self and each ally in the area

metadata.flavor: You and your allies coordinate to form a new battle line.
metadata.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You mark two enemies within 10 squares of you. Each target can shift up to their speed. You and each target gain 2 surges.
